languages.text: {n}Проводив взглядом обмякшее тело фактотума, Энрих Монтэг принимается мрачно жевать возникшую меж зубов палочку {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}лхо{/g}.{/n} "Итак, что мы имеем? Господин Данрок при смерти, все нападавшие или мертвы, или исчезли без следа вместе со священной реликвией, а показания свидетелей сходятся лишь в одном: Немезит с пособниками появились внезапно и так же внезапно исчезли. Трон знает, где нам теперь искать этих ублюдков!"

{n}Einrich watches the limp body of the Factotum get carried away and chews grimly on the {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g}-stick that has appeared between his teeth.{/n} "So, what do we have so far? Master Danrok is on his deathbed, all the attackers are either dead or have absconded along with the sacred relic, and the witnesses all agree on this one thing: Nemesite and his accomplices came out of nowhere and struck suddenly. Only the Throne knows where we can find these bastards now!"
languages.original_text: {n}Проводив взглядом обмякшее тело фактотума, Энрих Монтэг принимается мрачно жевать возникшую меж зубов палочку {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}лхо{/g}.{/n} "Итак, что мы имеем? Господин Данрок при смерти, все нападавшие или мертвы, или исчезли без следа вместе со священной реликвией, а показания свидетелей сходятся лишь в одном: Немезит с пособниками появились внезапно и так же внезапно исчезли. Трон знает, где нам теперь искать этих ублюдков!"

Only the Throne knows where we can find these bastards now!"

languages.text: {n}Einrich sieht zu, wie der leblose Körper des Faktotums weggetragen wird, und kaut grimmig auf dem {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}Lho{/g}-Stock herum, der zwischen seinen Zähnen aufgetaucht ist.{/n} "Also, was haben wir bis jetzt? Meister Danrok liegt auf dem Totenbett, alle Angreifer sind entweder tot oder zusammen mit dem heiligen Relikt geflohen, und die Zeugen sind sich in einer Sache alle einig: Nemesit und seine Komplizen kamen aus dem Nichts und haben unvermittelt zugeschlagen. Nur der Thron weiß, wo wir diese Mistkerle jetzt finden!"
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich watches the limp body of the Factotum get carried away and chews grimly on the {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g}-stick that has appeared between his teeth.{/n} "So, what do we have so far? Master Danrok is on his deathbed, all the attackers are either dead or have absconded along with the sacred relic, and the witnesses all agree on this one thing: Nemesite and his accomplices came out of nowhere and struck suddenly. Only the Throne knows where we can find these bastards now!"

Meister Danrok liegt auf dem Totenbett, alle Angreifer sind entweder tot oder zusammen mit dem heiligen Relikt geflohen, und die Zeugen sind sich in einer Sache alle einig: Nemesit und seine Komplizen kamen aus dem Nichts und haben unvermittelt zugeschlagen. Meister Danrok liegt auf dem Totenbett, alle Angreifer sind entweder tot oder zusammen mit dem heiligen Relikt geflohen, und die Zeugen sind sich in einer Sache alle einig: Nemesit und seine Komplizen kamen aus dem Nichts und haben unvermittelt zugeschlagen. Nur der Thron weiß, wo wir diese Mistkerle jetzt finden!"

languages.text: {n}Einrich observa cómo se llevan el cuerpo inerte del Factótum y roe con expresión circunspecta el cigarrillo de {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g} que ha aparecido entre sus dientes.{/n} «¿Entonces qué tenemos por ahora? El maestro Danrok está en su lecho de muerte, los agresores que no han muerto se han fugado con la reliquia sagrada y todos los testigos coinciden en una cosa: que Nemesitio y sus cómplices aparecieron de la nada y atacaron de repente. ¡Sabe el Trono dónde estarán ahora esos bastardos!».
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich watches the limp body of the Factotum get carried away and chews grimly on the {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g}-stick that has appeared between his teeth.{/n} "So, what do we have so far? Master Danrok is on his deathbed, all the attackers are either dead or have absconded along with the sacred relic, and the witnesses all agree on this one thing: Nemesite and his accomplices came out of nowhere and struck suddenly. Only the Throne knows where we can find these bastards now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich observa cómo se llevan el cuerpo inerte del Factótum y roe con expresión circunspecta el cigarrillo de lho que ha aparecido entre sus dientes.{/n} «¿Entonces qué tenemos por ahora? El maestro Danrok está en su lecho de muerte, los agresores que no han muerto se han fugado con la reliquia sagrada y todos los testigos coinciden en una cosa: que Nemesitio y sus cómplices aparecieron de la nada y atacaron de repente. ¡Sabe el Trono dónde estarán ahora esos bastardos!».

languages.text: {n}アインリッヒはファクトタムのぐったりした体が運ばれていくのを見送り、歯に挟んだ{g|Encyclopedia:Lho}ルホスティック{/g}を不機嫌そうに噛んだ。{/n}「それで、今はどういう状況ですか？マスター・ダンロックは今にも死にそうで、襲撃者たちは全員死んだか、聖遺物とともに逃げ出しました。分かっていることはひとつだけです。ネメサイトとその共犯者達はどこからともなく現れて、突然襲いかかってきた。王座は、今すぐ奴らを見つけ出せると分かっておられる！」
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich watches the limp body of the Factotum get carried away and chews grimly on the {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g}-stick that has appeared between his teeth.{/n} "So, what do we have so far? Master Danrok is on his deathbed, all the attackers are either dead or have absconded along with the sacred relic, and the witnesses all agree on this one thing: Nemesite and his accomplices came out of nowhere and struck suddenly. Only the Throne knows where we can find these bastards now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アインリッヒはファクトタムのぐったりした体が運ばれていくのを見送り、歯に挟んだアイホスティックを不機嫌そうに噛んだ。{/n}「それで、今はどういう状況ですか？マスター・ダンロックは今にも死にそうで、襲撃者たちは全員死んだか、聖遺物とともに逃げ出しました。分かっていることはひとつだけです。ネメサイトとその共犯者達はどこからともなく現れて、突然襲いかかってきた。王座は、今すぐ奴らを見つけ出せると分かっておられる！」

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇看着失去意识的高阶顾问被人抬走，神情严峻地咀嚼着不知什么时候出现在他齿间的{g|Encyclopedia:Lho}麻烟{/g}。{/n}“所以，现在是什么情况？丹罗克大师生命垂危，那些袭击者要么死了，要么带着圣物潜逃了。所有目击者的证词都很一致：涅墨斯特和他的同伙突然之间凭空出现，发起了袭击。至于现在，恐怕只有黄金王座才知道该去哪里找到这些混蛋！”
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich watches the limp body of the Factotum get carried away and chews grimly on the {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g}-stick that has appeared between his teeth.{/n} "So, what do we have so far? Master Danrok is on his deathbed, all the attackers are either dead or have absconded along with the sacred relic, and the witnesses all agree on this one thing: Nemesite and his accomplices came out of nowhere and struck suddenly. Only the Throne knows where we can find these bastards now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇看着失去意识的高阶顾问被人抬走，神情严峻地咀嚼着不知什么时候出现在他齿间的麻烟。{/n}“所以，现在是什么情况？丹罗克大师生命垂危，那些袭击者要么死了，要么带着圣物潜逃了。所有目击者的证词都很一致：涅墨斯特和他的同伙突然之间凭空出现，发起了袭击。至于现在，恐怕只有黄金王座才知道该去哪里找到这些混蛋！”

languages.text: {n}̋Einrich regarde le corps inerte du factotum alors que des serviteurs l'emportent en mâchonnant sinistrement le {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}cigalho{/g} apparu entre ses dents.{/n} « Bien, faisons le point. Maître Danrok est à l'agonie, les assaillants sont soit morts soit en fuite avec la relique sacrée, et tous les témoins s'accordent sur une chose : Némésite et ses complices ont surgi de nulle part pour frapper sans avertissement. Seul le Trône sait où se cachent ces ordures à présent ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich watches the limp body of the Factotum get carried away and chews grimly on the {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g}-stick that has appeared between his teeth.{/n} "So, what do we have so far? Master Danrok is on his deathbed, all the attackers are either dead or have absconded along with the sacred relic, and the witnesses all agree on this one thing: Nemesite and his accomplices came out of nowhere and struck suddenly. Only the Throne knows where we can find these bastards now!"

Seul le Trône sait où se cachent ces ordures à présent ! »

languages.text: {n}Einrich, Kâhya'nın buruşuk bedeninin taşınmasını izleyerek dişlerinin arasındaki {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}liho{/g} dalını suratsızca çiğniyor.{/n} "Şu ana kadar başımıza neler geldi şimdi? Üstat Danrok ölüm döşeğinde, tüm saldıranlar ya öldü ya da kutsal yadigârla birlikte kayıplara karıştı ve tüm tanıkların hemfikir olduğu tek bir husus var. Nemezit ile ortakları, bir anda ortaya çıkıp aniden saldırdılar. Şimdi o şerefsizleri nerede bulabileceğimizi yalnızca Taht bilir!"
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich watches the limp body of the Factotum get carried away and chews grimly on the {g|Encyclopedia:Lho}lho{/g}-stick that has appeared between his teeth.{/n} "So, what do we have so far? Master Danrok is on his deathbed, all the attackers are either dead or have absconded along with the sacred relic, and the witnesses all agree on this one thing: Nemesite and his accomplices came out of nowhere and struck suddenly. Only the Throne knows where we can find these bastards now!"
